entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Vaughan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming north 30 early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
